reviews.text:
The room is cute, spacious a bit noisy over the weekends. Nice view over the canal and kind of main street.
Breakfast is good
Service is good. Always someone to assists there. Coffee for free
I would definitely recommend that.
You have to be young for their deep steps but they said that before so all is fine.

Thank you so much

Superb location in a fabulous city.  Considering it is a budget hotel it didn’t feel like it.  The staff were wonderful and accommodating.  The room was perfect overlooking Het Prinsengracht and the breakfast was great.
Central location. Really steep stairs. Very difficult to climb. We could not bring our luggage up. Beautiful interior. Free hot drinks at reception.

I was very pleasantly surprised with my stay here. (Based on the affordable price). The room was clean and I faced out onto a courtyard, which was incredibly quiet. I slept with my windows open and didn’t hear anything all night. The breakfast was a very good, elaborate continental breakfast with fresh bread, egg, hard-boiled egg, croissants, a great coffee machine, and a few options for yogurt and fruit and veggies. Both of the reception area and the breakfast room are quite charming and well decorated with older Dutch decor and antiques. Oh and the breakfast room looks out onto the charming street and canal! I would highly recommend this place!
Exceptional location, on a canal, but surprisingly quiet at night. Lovely view from the ground floor windows at breakfast. Very nice staff. I would visit again.
